articles.title: Omar, Tlaib balk after report of Trump administration plan to expand travel ban: 'Straight up racism!'
articles.description: Reps. Ilhan Omar, D-Minn., and Rashida Tlaib, D-Mich., expressed outrage Friday after a report said the Trump administration was considering an expansion of the nation's travel ban to cover more countries.
articles.content:
Reps. Ilhan Omar, D-Minn., and Rashida Tlaib, D-Mich., expressed outrage Friday after a report said the Trump administration was considering an expansion of the nation's travel ban to cover more countries.

articles.author: Brian Brenberg
articles.title: Brian Brenberg: Iran fears sanctions more than bullets -- Economic pain is our most potent weapons
articles.description: Economic sanctions remain the most effective tactic to bring Iran back to the negotiating table in a weakened position and advance a safer, denuclearized world.
articles.content: With the killing of Iran’s General Qassem Soleimani and retaliation by Iran on U.S. bases in Iraq, many predict that military escalation is inevitable. But this view ignores the increasingly devastating effects of economic sanctions on Iran. The clear and com… [+4361 chars]

articles.title: Texas gusts topple 18-wheeler; Arkansas tornado destroys at least 3 homes
articles.description: Strong winds in Texas reportedly flipped an 18-wheeler on its side in Dallas County during a severe thunderstorm that blew through the region Friday.
articles.content:
Strong winds in Texas reportedly flipped an 18-wheeler on its side in Dallas County during a severe thunderstorm that blew through the region Friday.

articles.title: Southern California doctoral student, mother and sister among 176 killed in Iran plane crash
articles.description: A Southern California doctoral student and her mother and sister were reportedly among the 176 people killed when a Ukrainian passenger jet crashed in Iran early Wednesday morning.
articles.content:

articles.title: Tammy Bruce: Chelsea Clinton is worth big bucks -- Here's how she managed to make all that money
articles.description: For time immemorial Americans have asked how it is that politicians manage to get filthy rich in “public service.” Now, their children are also getting rich riding those coattails.
articles.content:

articles.description: All believers have been adopted into the family of God. We come with imperfections, with brokenness that will take years to rehabilitate.

articles.title: Utah woman goes missing in Florida while on work trip; last seen on hotel video in pajamas: husband
